member.name: M:VaraniumSharp.CompoundDocumentFormatStorage.CompoundFileManager.GetCompoundFile(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a compound file. This method will create the file if it does not exist, otherwise it will retrieve the file from the internal storage or simply open the current file
member.returns: Open compound file - Do not close!

member.name: M:VaraniumSharp.CompoundDocumentFormatStorage.CompoundFileManager.GetStorage(OpenMcdf.CompoundFile,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the CFStorage where the file in the path is stored
member.param: FilePath where file is stored (including filename)

member.summary: Split a FilePath into the sub-directories

member.summary: Semaphores used to lock access when attempting to open/create compound files on a drive
